title: A new mechanical approach to handle generalized Hopfield neural networks

tldr.text: A modification of the cost function of the Hopfield model whose salient features shine in its Taylor expansion and result in more than pairwise interactions with alternate signs is proposed, suggesting a unified framework for handling both with deep learning and network pruning.
